meanings.sent1: The bank vault is supersafe from any danger.
meanings.sent2: She always feels supersafe when wearing her seatbelt in the car.
meanings.sent3: The supersafe teddy bear guarded the child's dreams at night.
meanings.sent4: The supersafe fortress protected the kingdom from all threats.
meanings.sent5: The supersafe lock clicked shut, ensuring no one could enter without permission.

meanings.definition: To make something extremely safe or secure.
meanings.sent1: He worked hard to supersafe the house before the storm arrived.
meanings.sent2: The parents decided to supersafe the playground by adding extra padding.
meanings.sent3: She tried to supersafe her secret diary from her nosy little brother.
meanings.sent4: The knight vowed to supersafe the kingdom from any harm.
meanings.sent5: The cybersecurity expert knew how to supersafe the sensitive data from hackers.
